data.speaker: Player
data.content: THis wasn't open before... Was it?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: It's filled with blood? Something messed up is going on around here.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: It looks like something broke out of here...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Whatever it was, it went towards the stairs.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: The stairs... They feel different now...
